Description détaillée
Class ParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519
Implements Curve25519 core functions
Based on the ref10 curve25519 code provided by libsodium
https://github.com/jedisct1/libsodium/blob/master/src/libsodium/crypto_core/curve25519/ref10/curve25519_ref10.c

static fe_normalize (ParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519_Fe $f)[static]
Ensure limbs are less than 28 bits long to prevent float promotion.
This uses a constant-time conditional swap under the hood.

fe_sub() fe_subParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519 ParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519fe_sub
static fe_sub (ParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519_Fe $f, ParagonIE_Sodium_Core_Curve25519_Fe $g)[static]
Subtract two field elements.
h = f - g
Preconditions: |f| bounded by 1.1*2^25,1.1*2^24,1.1*2^25,1.1*2^24,etc. |g| bounded by 1.1*2^25,1.1*2^24,1.1*2^25,1.1*2^24,etc.
Postconditions: |h| bounded by 1.1*2^26,1.1*2^25,1.1*2^26,1.1*2^25,etc. Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :
